amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to mandate that the U.S. Forest Service may not condition ski area permits on the transfer of title of any water right or require any ski area permittee to acquire a water right in the name of the United States.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.
